content.p: 1337 Ventures Internship Programme Description: We are 1337 Ventures, 1337 pronounced leet, Malaysia’s first privately funded venture capital and accelerator that invests in the technology space. Our early success stories from our initial portfolio of successful games are in the likes of Chinese Zombie Wars, Agent RX, Tell No One and Boboiboy. We have diversified our portfolio with the latest batch of startups in our pipeline to include retail analytics, wearable technology, proximity marketing, social networking and interactive education. Responsibilities: At 1337 Ventures, we don’t talk. We just do. Join our league of Superheroes and learn how to create awesome in startups around the region. We are actively seeking to groom high calibre individuals in the business of creating value for fast-paced and high-growth startups.The ideal candidate should be a real superhero – balancing schedules, managing a growing portfolio of startups, working with founders and funders alike. Requirements: We are looking for energetic, ambitious and passion undergraduate degree students to join us for your internship practice by building your personal development skill during your semester break or during the period required by your College/University. These internship will offer you the real world insights and exposure to actual startup working life, an experiential, foundation to your career choices, and the chance to built valuable business networks. Importantly, we seek candidates who have the right attitude, personality and work-ethic to join us.The faint-hearted need not apply. Apply for this internship. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
